definition: mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
not equal to/not as good as/inferior to/it would be better to
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means

sentences.english: Such as the need to occupy a separate seat, the child should be the purchase of tickets.
sentences.chinese: 如需要单独占用座位时，应购买儿童票。

sentences.english: The breath of Jehovah, like a stream of brimstone , Sets it on fire.
sentences.chinese: 耶和华的气如一股硫磺火，使它着起来。

sentences.english: If yes, by which the Quality System is issued?
sentences.chinese: 如有质量体系认证，是由何机构签发？

sentences.english: It is used for petroleum exploration and engineering tasks such as simulating aircraft designs.
sentences.chinese: 用于石油勘探和工程任务，如模拟飞机的设计。

sentences.english: Transposons are one cause of genetic diseases such as haemophilia .
sentences.chinese: 转位子是产生如血友病一类遗传病的一个致病因子。

sentences.english: Second, the participation of non-owner occupied, such as housing loan or rental.
sentences.chinese: 二是让非所有人占有，如将房屋出借或出租。

sentences.english: He maketh my feet like hinds' feet: and setteth me upon my high places.
sentences.chinese: 他使我的脚快如母鹿的蹄，又使我在高处安稳。

sentences.english: He has three good friends, such as Mary , Jhon.
sentences.chinese: 他有三个好朋友，如玛丽和约翰。

sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特别的浓香，口感如鲍鱼，极润滑爽口。

sentences.english: If pregnant, take an iron supplement, as recommended by an obstetrician or other health care provider.
sentences.chinese: 如怀孕，要在妇产医生的指导下食用补铁的食物。

sentences.english: A few abilities have had the duration of the secondary effects extended, such as Dragon's Talon.
sentences.chinese: 一些技能的附加效果持续时间被延长，如巨龙钩爪。

sentences.english: I was dancing through green waves of grass like the sea.
sentences.chinese: 我在草地里如大海般的绿浪中起舞。

sentences.english: Let life be beautiful like summer of flowers and death like autumn leaves.
sentences.chinese: 使生如夏花之绚烂，死如秋叶之精美。

sentences.english: All other event types, like changes or intermediary steps, are processed differently.
sentences.chinese: 所有其他事件类型，如变化或中间步骤，被区别对待。

sentences.english: If the temperature is below 0℃ please use Varlon Brand anti-freeze glass cleaner.
sentences.chinese: 如气温低于此温度，可使用慧霖牌防冻型玻璃水。

sentences.english: He giveth snow like wool: he scattereth the hoarfrost like ashes.
sentences.chinese: 他降雪如羊毛，撒霜如炉灰。

definition: class/rank/grade/equal to/same as/to wait for/to await/et cetera/and so on/et al. (and other authors)/after/as soon as/once
et cetera/and so on .../wait a minute!/hold on!
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
